Reviews.Title: Sucks the life out of your batteries
Reviews.Author: Meagan S
Reviews.Content: I personally would not recommend this camera to anyone. This camera ONLY takes brand new batteries to work and the batteries only last 1-2 days, Maybe even an extra day but i would say no longer than that! It Literally sucks the life out of any type of batteries. I have had this camera for two years, but havent used it much because of the battery problem.

Reviews.Title: best camera ever
Reviews.Author: DUANE HOLLENBECK
Reviews.Content: purchased these cameras on the way to Orlando. have taken 3000 pictures with it. it does videos too, you should get one

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: butterfly
Reviews.Content: My Son really loves this Camera, and its his favorite color Purple. It does not come with a Case tho9ugh, so I gave an old one.
